name: Avoid using NOT EXISTS  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches all the artifacts using NOT EXISTS.
output:
This report lists RPG300 programs using NOT EXISTS.
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Program full name
rationale: Use of 'NOT EXIST' keyword slows down the query
remediation: Queries should not use 'NOT EXIST' keywords in WHERE clause
remediationSample:
Use join with null check:

SELECT o.id
FROM purchase AS o LEFT OUTER
JOIN tcggamesummary AS g
ON g.id = o.id
WHERE o.date < TODAY - 365
AND g.id IS NULL;
sample:
SELECT o.id
FROM purchase AS o
WHERE o.date < TODAY - 365
AND NOT EXISTS
(
SELECT g.id
FROM tcggamesummary AS g
WHERE g.id = o.id
);
